DOC.brief_title: A Study Three Drug Combination Therapies HIV-Infected Patients Who Have Never Been Treated With Anti-HIV Drugs
DOC.detailed_description: In open-label , strategic study patient evaluate Weeks 0 , 1 , 2 , 4 , 8 , 12 Week 48 treat one follow regimen : Stavudine ( d4T ) + Didanosine ( ddI ) + Lamivudine ( 3TC ) d4T + ddI + Indinavir d4T + ddI + Nevirapine .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : Diagnosed asymptomatic HIV infection . HIV1 RNA great 500 copies/ml . CD4+ Tcell count great 200/mm3 . Never receive antiretroviral therapy . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Excluded : Severe nonHIVrelated disease . Patients follow prior condition exclude : History neuropathy . Prior Medication : Excluded : Investigational drug within 1 month prior study . Immunomodulatory drug within 1 month prior study . Prior Treatment : Excluded : Radiation therapy within past month . Chemotherapy within past month .
